taskbody.context: You will use the axe-core library .jar file to import required packages in the code snippet.To integrate the axe-core library with , do as follow:

step.stepresult:
You can download the axe-core library .jar file from the Maven Repository website: AXe Selenium Integration.
We recommend downloading the 4.4.1 version for this guide. The latest version of Axe lacks a few required packages for the code snippet.

step.cmd: Go to Project > Settings > Library Management, then Add the axe-core library .jar file to the External Libraries.

image.alt: Add the .jar file to external library
